siteMetadata.title: Kostas Bariotis' Blog
siteMetadata.description: Senior full stack engineer @geekbot_io, co-organizer of @devitconf & @skgnodejs, host of Devastation Podcast.

posts.excerpt: I am introducing  Stargento.com  to the  Magento  community. I am looking forward for your thoughts and feedback. Hit me on  Twitter . This is a meta-post for a post i wrote on  Medium . Thoughts?
posts.html:
